serverSnapshot.query: SELECT transaction_id, ... FROM public.transactions WHERE account_id = <accountId> AND transaction_id = ANY(<localTransactionIds>)

normalization.nullVsEmptyString: coalesced to empty string for text fields in comparisons
normalization.numeric: compared numeric fields as numeric (amount, taxRatePct, subtotal, sumItemPurchasePrices)
normalization.itemIds: treated arrays as sets (distinct + order-insensitive), filtered to canonical I-... ids only
